content: double_crochet into next st fptc round post of next st double_crochet into next st fptc round post of next st double_crochet into next st fptc round post of next 6 sts be careful to work them in the correct sequential order double_crochet into next st fptc round post of next st double_crochet into next 2 sts 14 stitches row 23 chain 3 turn double_crochet into 2nd double_crochet of previous row bptc round post of next st double_crochet into next st bptc round post of next 6 sts double_crochet into next st bptc round post of next st double_crochet into next 2 sts 14 stitches fasten_off leaving a very long tail when you ve completed 2 put then wrong sides facing and using stitch markers line up the row ready for sewing together using the extra long tails whip-stitch the sides and top together leaving the bottom edge unworked special stitches fptc and bptc for lefties fptc bptc 1 yarn over twice 1 yarn over twice 2 instead of 2 take the crochet inserting the hook hook to the back of into the stitch insert your work the hook from left to right behind the 3 insert hook from stitch post left to right in front of the stitch post 3 yarn over and pull loop back behind the 4 yarn over and pull stitch post loop back in front the stitch post 4 complete stitch as you would for a 5 complete triple as normal triple usual double chain pictures for lefties
